titles.title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit issuers of credit cards from limiting the ability of governmental agencies to charge fees for honoring credit cards.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1291)
Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Credit and Insurance.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit a credit card issuer from limiting the ability of governmental agencies to collect from a credit card user a fee for honoring the credit card.
